column4: looks like you can try a force option in your hfsplus mount command https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/49052/comments/9 ..
thanks but that didn't work. I still get "error while copying to "diskname". destination is read only"
i have no personal experience with hfsplus, but the bug report also has a link to source code from the developer that is recent (#36) .. seems like your only option i'm afraid
i guess for a similar reason why if you type 'bank put some more money in my account' it won't happen .. file permissions and filesystem support are separate worlds
